front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Specifying Electric Submersible Pump Cable

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: In this standard minimum requirements for the construction, manufacturing, purchasing, and application of electric submersible pump cable are presented. The cable is round or flat, with ethylene-propylene rubber insulation, nitrile jacket, and armor, and is rated for voltages not exceeding 3 kV or 5kV and for ambient temperatures not exceeding 284 degrees F. Conductors, insulation, barrier (optional), assembly and jacket, armor, requirements for testing by the manufacturer, and cable ampacity are covered.<>
